title: Clear night city driving with frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 5.0 m/s). There are 13 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety at night. The frequent braking events indicate that the driver is being cautious and attentive to the road conditions.
